name: Music_5059.wav
keywords: ['gospel song', 'male voice', 'groovy bass', 'piano', 'percussion', 'ride cymbal', 'slow tempo', 'emotional voice']
caption: This gospel song features a male voice singing the main melody in an emotional voice. This is accompanied by the percussion playing continuously in sixteenth notes on the ride cymbal. The bass plays a groovy lick and fill based on the root note of the chord. The piano plays a chord followed by a fill and an ascending run. This song can be played in a Christian movie.
